title: Many Americans were looking forward to a carefree summer. But Covid measures are creeping back into our reality
content:
1. Many Americans were looking forward to a carefree summer. But Covid measures are creeping back into our reality  CNN
  2. Fauci: CDC looking at changing mask guidelines  Yahoo News
  3. Dr. Fauci says a third booster shot for COVID-19 'might likely happen' for people who are immunocompromised  Business Insider
  4. Fauci: 'We're going in the wrong direction' on Covid-19 cases  CNN
  5. Fauci says health officials considering mask guidance revision for vaccinated  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 多くのアメリカ人は、のんびりとした夏を楽しみにしていました。しかし、コヴィッド対策は私たちの現実に再び忍び寄っています
